# Ethereum

This store operates with Ethereum, the most recent technology
and cryptocurrency available. [Read more here](http://ethereum.org).

In order to get Ether, follow this steps.

1. Sign up with [BitPanda.com](https://www.bitpanda.com/?ref=3425424078498173301).
2. Buy the amount of Ether for your product.
3. Make a transfer to the QR Code.

Remember, every transaction made on this platform,
is public and almost instantaneous. There aren't fee's
charged for international transfers.

![QR Code](data:image/png;base64,)

0x261271f8eD6D5224C05939d1F1a60E07ef0f3211


# Paypal

You can send your payment to the following email account.

`alan.andradec+paypal@gmail.com`
